dialogue: The theme of our engineering conference is...
Employees are our most valuable asset.
And like most assets, you decline in value over time.
I know what you're thinking: not all assets decline in value.
For example, fine art is worth more every year.
But I don't think the Louvre will be asking for one of these anytime soon.
On your way out, Mister Catbert will give each of you a certificate of depreciation.
It's still better than last year's theme, "Have you earned your air today?"
